price: ellos se apresuran a realizar obras de bien, y son los primeros en hacerlas.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
